description: Number of character table entries of the symmetric group S_n which are < 0.
prog: (GAP) A051748 := n -> Sum(Irr(CharacterTable("Symmetric", n)), chi -> Number(chi, x->x<0)); # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 14 2012, revised Sep 05 2012
author: JOHN MCKAY (mckay(AT)cs.concordia.ca), Dec 08 1999
extensions: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 14 2012
